alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Russell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 12 at 3:53PM EDT until October 12 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN CLINTON AND SOUTH CENTRAL RUSSELL COUNTIES... At 252 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles west of Cabell, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Aaron, Narvel, Seventy Six, Cumberland City, Rowena and Marlow. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
